Restlet API 0.17 beta

Restlet API is a Java framework for the REST architectural style

There is a reference implementation available, the Noelios Restlet Engine.

See:
          Description

Restlet API
org.restlet Top-level classes, interfaces and exceptions.
org.restlet.component Units of software instructions and internal state.
org.restlet.connector Mechanisms that enable communication between components.
org.restlet.data Elements of information handled by a component via a connector.

 

Restlet API is a Java framework for the REST architectural style

There is a reference implementation available, the Noelios Restlet Engine.
It is developped and supported by Noelios Consulting.

See Also:
REST dissertation by Roy T. Fielding
